timeline.message: Support for persistence mode in L2 networks
Add network tag to nic info - required for xen
Include cleanup of n/w resources on n/w deletion + prevent n/w resource deletion on detroy/stop/unplug of VM from persistent n/w
Add check to prevent deletion of n/w resources when last VM/non-persistent network is deleted but there exists another n/w with overlapping vlan which is persistent
Added additional marvin tests + defensive checks
API discovery: Prevent overwrite of API parameters in case the API names are the same
